DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate incidence reoperations associate use smooth textured NATRELLE® INSPIRA® TruForm® 1 TruForm® 2 device patient undergone primary breast augmentation .
DOC.brief_title: Retrospective Study Reoperation After Primary Augmentation With NATRELLE® INSPIRA® Breast Implants
